title: Pedro scores superb double to give Chelsea top eight finish
body_text:
Pedro scores superb double to give Chelsea top eight finish
This content isn't available any more.
There was an error
Joao Pedro scores twice as Chelsea beat Napoli 3-2 to secure automatic qualification into the last 16 of the UEFA Champions League.
MATCH REPORT: Champions League - Napoli 2-3 Chelsea
Available to UK users only.
